body_html: /cc @ptillet @gongzg Is there any interest in this by Intel? I really hope that we don't fragment OPENCL here like in Caffe where we have an AMD fork, Intel unmerged PRs, another semi-unofficial AMD PR, and a long staging user PR (plus two old abandoned Opencl efforts). If somebody is interested in the history can take a look at BVLC/caffe#2610 comments.

body: /cc @ptillet @gongzg Is there any interest in this by Intel? I really hope that we don't fragment OPENCL here like in Caffe where we have an AMD fork, Intel unmerged PRs, another semi-unofficial AMD PR, and a long staging user PR (plus two old abandoned Opencl efforts). If somebody is interested in the history can take a look at https://github.com/BVLC/caffe/pull/2610 comments.
